about_the_game:
This high-quality character, designed exclusively for Leadwerks Game Engine, includes high-res 4096x4096 textures, an assault rifle, and a prefab set up to work with the Leadwerks soldierAI script. Drop him into your game, set his team to "good" or "bad", and watch him fight!

Texture Resolution: 4096
Polygon Count: 12,970
Source art is included in FBX, PNG, and BMP formats.

Animations

  • Death
  • Fire
  • Hit
  • Idle
  • Melee
  • Run
  • Walk
